title: Химера
overview: 2012. Drug lord Rahmon is trying to seize the market share of the Tatarintsev family, who control the supply of cocaine through the seaport of St. Petersburg. Major of drug control Konkov undertakes to unravel the criminal knot. At this time, the adapted autistic Juice begins to sell drugs in a new, safe way: without face-to-face contacts with customers, through the new Chimera website.
